A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A few awkward jokes aside\, the script and story line are pretty good here - with just enough doubt and jeopardy to keep you interested. The major problem is in the realisation and the lack of fluidity between CGI\, externals and internals. The internals\, particularly\, are pretty shoddy and continually disconnect you from the film with their lack of realism. And although bringing back the puppetry for Yoda was a nice idea\, he now just looks like a puppet. Altogether\, more lumpy than thrilling...
